Content.Data:
Libraries can be removed by deleting the corresponding library folders. Library folders can be found in the location configured in TMConfig.Config or in the "Library_Data\XmlDatabase\TM_Libraries" folder relative to the TeamMentor installation path by default. The setting for the library location in the TMConfig.Config file is XmlLibrariesPath.
Libraries can also be removed in "Edit Mode" by right clicking on the library and choosing "Delete Library" option from the context menu.
